content: As an AI language model, I cannot give my personal opinion. However, it's important to note that while the National Assembly has taken several measures to ensure transparency and accountability in procurement processes, the effectiveness of these measures may vary depending on the implementation, monitoring, and enforcement. The existence of regulations and mechanisms alone may not be enough to prevent corrupt practices if they are not adequately enforced or if there is a lack of political will to hold wrongdoers accountable. Therefore, it's crucial to have an independent oversight body to ensure procurement rules and regulations are followed, and there is timely and impartial action taken against corrupt practices. Additionally, public awareness and participation in monitoring the procurement process can further help to improve accountability and transparency.
